english_measurements.address: 1st Floor, Belapur Bhavan, C.B.D., Navi Mumbai - 400 614
english_measurements.recipient_address: 7th Floor, Interface-7, New Link Road, Malad (W)
english_measurements.subject: Regarding payment of road excavation charges.
english_measurements.reference_2: Estimate submitted by the Executive Engineer, Turbhe on 23/9/25.
english_measurements.introduction: This is to inform you that M/s. Bharti Airtel Limited has proposed excavation work in the Nerul division, South Central, from near HP Petrol pump to Manish Export, for a total of 812 meters using the open trenching method. In this regard, the Hon. Executive Engineer has submitted an estimate for the asphalt road excavation. As per the government's decision and the estimate provided by the Executive Engineer, the charges have been determined. Therefore, you are requested to deposit the following amount for the excavation work in the Municipal Corporation.
english_measurements.conclusion: As per the above, the re-establishment charges amount to Rs 1,23,86,436/-, supervision charges to Rs 18,57,965/-, security deposit to Rs 14,24,440/-, and ground rent to Rs 1,62,400/-, making a total amount of Rs 1,58,31,241/- (In words: Rupees One Crore Fifty-Eight Lakh Thirty-One Thousand Two Hundred Forty-One Only). This amount should be paid to the accounts department of Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation via a demand draft (D.D.) and a copy of the receipt should be submitted to this office. Also, an agreement regarding the excavation should be submitted. Only after that, the process for granting permission for road excavation will be initiated. Please note this. As per Notification No. 03/2018 Central Tax (Rate) dated 25 January 2018, the responsibility to pay GST on the above amount will lie with your organization. Please take note of this.

charges_table.description: Ground rent at the rate of Rs 10/- per year per meter for 20 years one-time Rs 200/- per meter
